name: Instruct subordinates
text: The director of finance shall, from time to time, instruct the officers of the director's department in relation to their duties and business. [CC 1859, §472; RL 1925, §1246; am imp L 1932 2d, c 40; RL 1935, §2205; RL 1945, §5806; RL 1955, §132-6; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §14; am L 1963, c 114, §1; HRS ; gen ch 1985]
